thread.title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd briefly make it Instagram official during romantic trip to Italy
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd briefly make it Instagram official during romantic trip to Italy

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd briefly make it Instagram official during romantic trip to Italy
text:
Selena Gomez and The Weeknd briefly make it Instagram official during romantic trip to Italy The former Disney star and the Canadian singer are currently enjoying a loved-up break in Europe Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Selena and The Weeknd make it Instagram official! Share this video Get celebs   
Selena Gomez and The Weeknd are taking their relationship to the next level by making it Instagram official. 
On Monday, the former Disney star posted a short video of the Canadian singer as the pair enjoyed a boat ride during their romantic trip to Italy. 
She captioned it simply with heart emoji eyes. 
However, it wasn't long before Justin Bieber's ex had deleted the video from her page entirely. 
It's unclear why she decided to erase the candid clip. Selena and The Weeknd make it Instagram official (Photo: Instagram) Selena Gomez arrives at LAX Airport (Photo: Splash News) 
Selena and the 26-year-old musician - who was previously in an 18-month relationship with model Bella Hadid - sparked romance rumours after they were spotted locking lips outside a restaurant in Santa Monica in early January. 
Sources later claimed there were "sparks" between the pair when they first met at the Victoria Secret's annual fashion show where they both performed last year. 
An insider claimed: "There were sparks when they first met at the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in 2015. 
"They both performed and The Weeknd was just taken by Selena." 
Meanwhile, it's also been reported that Bella thinks Selena is just using The Weeknd. (Photo: Splash News) Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now The Weeknd and Bella Hadid look happy on the red carpet before SHOCK Selena Gomez photos Share this video Watch Next 
The 20-year-old model has reportedly warned her ex-boyfriend - real name Abel Tesfaye - about the 24-year-old singer's real intentions. 
A source said: "Bella has reached out to Abel a few times and told him Selena is using him. He thinks she’s just jealous and isn’t listening to her." Victoria's Secret Fashion Show (Photo: Rex Features) 
While another source added that Bella was "hurt" that her ex had moved on with the Come and Get It star. 
They said: "Bella and Abel’s split wasn’t dramatic, but of course she’s hurt and p****d that he’s moved on so quickly with Selena." Read More Gigi and Bella let off steam after Selena snogs her ex (Photo: Splash News) 
But Selena isn't worried about hurting Bella as they've never been that close. 
An insider said previously: "Selena was always the girl who stayed away from a lot of the Taylor Swift crew, except for Taylor. She preferred to be one-on-one with Taylor and didn't like being a part of the whole squad thing." Bella Hadid (Photo: Rex) 
And another added: "Selena is not good friends with either Gigi or Bella. She knows them through other people, but they are just acquaintances. 
"She is friendly with them, but not friends with them ... Selena and Gigi were never fond of each other, so Selena definitely doesn't have any stipulations about hooking up with or dating Bella's ex." Like us on Facebook
